awards.title: Country Champion (Singapore)
awards.description:
• Participants could choose to propose solutions for one of the three themes: (1) Sustainable Materials, (2) The New Paradigm (a pandemic aware world), and (3) Equity (through science and technology).

  • The 3M Inspire Challenge took place across two stages. The first stage, known as the Country-Level Semi-Finals, saw students face-off against their local peers in a live judging panel on October 21, 26 & 27, 2022. The winners of this stage were crowned the title of “Country Champion”, awarded a cash prize of USD$2,000, and internships at local 3M offices.

educations.description:
·         Placed on Dean's List for AY 2018/2019 & 2019/2020

·         Major in operations management

·         Relevant coursework: Spreadsheet Modelling & Analysis, Project Management

·         Relevant coursework: Spreadsheet Modelling & Analysis, Supply Chain Management, Global Supply Chains

·         Member of Beta Gamma Sigma international business honour society
·         Projects involving design thinking, from conducting user interviews to developing prototypes

experiences.title: Apps Software Engineer
experiences.description:
·         Successfully programmed, tested, and assessed 5+ API endpoints, meeting client requirements.

·         Programmed backend business logic for API with Java and Spring Boot according to client’s requirements

·         Orchestrated testing using Swagger UI and Postman, ensuring API functionality and reliability.

·         Engineered frontend of a dashboard with Angular

·         Led documentation of application functional specifications, detailing use cases, actors, and exceptions.

·         Reviewed security audits with Fortify Application Security and engineered fixes

·         Contributed to a collaborative team environment, working closely with technical architects and development teams.

·         Utilised Agile methodologies to facilitate efficient project management and iterative development.

·         Led development on unit testing suite using Jest and React-Testing-Library which led to increased stability for code releases and a 50% decrease in bugs

·         Assessed and implemented suggestions by Fortify Security and SonarQube, ensuring high quality code.

·         Designed API endpoints with interactions with Oracle SQL database.

·         Refined a client-facing web application through a cloud migration project, implementing React and Typescript.

·         Conducted integration testing with payment and data flows, ensuring end-to-end functionality.

·         Leveraged Linux and Microsoft SQL Server to troubleshoot and resolve user enquiries as application support.

·         Leveraged webpack to customise development and production builds for frontend application.

·         Collaborated with teammates effectively with Git versioning.

·         Conducted User Acceptance Testing, ensuring that software quality meets client requirements.

·         Utilised various application scan tools to identify and apply security enhancements.

·         Leveraged GitLab’s CI/CD pipeline to monitor and deploy Microservice applications.

·         Led UAT processes by documenting test cases, tracking bugs, and assisting with troubleshooting.

·         Developed internal system that integrated Jira with big data system, enhancing issue tracking and resolution.

·         Reviewed and diagnosed existing Spring Batch jobs in a team.

experiences.title: Intern
experiences.description:
·         Discovered and unified past marketing strategies, reducing costs by S$30+/month

·         Formulated a comprehensive business strategy for a new social enterprise within a 2-month period.

·         Designed and developed 10 web pages using WordPress, enhancing online presence.

·         Collaborated with a diverse team to brainstorm and implement effective business strategies.

·         Leveraged Yoast SEO to improve search performance.

·         Conceptualised UI design of webpage, landing page and theming.

experiences.title: Sales and Marketing Intern
experiences.description:
·         Drove usage of customer relationship management system used by marketing team

·         Developed system for capturing 800+ sales data points across stages of marketing funnel

·         Accelerated data ETL process by integrating Excel Power Query with file downloaded from Saleshandy, reducing time taken by 50%

·         Designed a simplified organisational process flowchart with Figma and aligned staff to desired process

·         Orchestrated a strong SEO foothold while closely with technical team.

·         Participated in User Acceptance Testing to refine key features before rollout.

experiences.title: Content Population Intern
experiences.description:
·         Collaborated across 3+ functional groups to author and standardize over 300 web pages and 2000+ FAQ pages.

·         Developed an internal bug-raising process, improving bug-related efficiency by 50%.

·         Trained 2 interns and 3+ employees on content authoring using Adobe Experience Manager.

·         Communicated and resolved queries raised through 1000+ bugs with relevant stakeholders.

·         Initiated change processes to further standardize web pages using inputs from various functional groups.

·         Managed project tasks and bug-tracking deliverables efficiently in an Agile Scrum team with Azure DevOps.

·         Facilitated communication with pertinent internal and external stakeholders, adeptly navigating towards mutually agreeable solutions.

projects.title: Inventory Management Project – Cloud Native Solution on AWS
projects.description:
·         Architected an inventory management system for a nonprofit organisation specialising in food donations.

·         Developed useful functions for public, staff and manager with loosely coupled microservices architecture.

·         Secure authentication empowers staff to perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations with ease.

·         DevOps and CI/ CD with Jenkins work seamlessly in the cloud to ensure maintainability.

·         Prepared test scripts for load testing using JMeter.

projects.title: Portfolio Project - Weather App
projects.description:
·         Translated Figma wireframes to working, maintainable React, implementing CRUD.

·         Tech stack: React, Typescript, Vite, Shadcn

projects.title: Side Project – Hyqueue on Github, fork of QueueSG
projects.description:
·         Integrated a user-friendly dashboard for administrators and staff to manage queues in real-time.

·         Utilised modern full-stack web technology Next.js and Typescript, ensuring a scalable application.

·         Optimised user experience by ensuring the system is intuitive and easy to navigate.
